description: Details of a Product Specification response. These details are used for Serviceability Responses.
title: productSpecResponse

$eref.description: Details of an ethernet product specification. These details are used for Serviceability Responses.
$eref.title: ethernetProductSpecDetail

___accessTechnology.description: The underlying technology used to transmit data across the Access Medium (e.g., DOCSIS 3.0).

___accessMedium.description: The type of media the service  should delivered over (e.g., Fiber, Coax, Twisted Pair).

___mtuSize.description: The maximum transmission unit size specifies the maximum length ENNI Frame in bytes allowed at the ENNI. An integer greater or equal to 1526.

___sellerClassOfService.description: An organization's internal name for a Class of Service. For example, a 'High' CoS may be named 'Real-Time' within a specific organization.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, ethernetProductSpecDetail.

___classOfService.description: The desired Class of Service, as defined by MEF 23.1.

___colorForwardingEnabled.description: Color Forwarding is an OVC attribute defining the relationship between the color on an egress ENNI frame and the color of the corresponding ingress ENNI Frame or Service Frame.  For ordering, this attribute identifies if the Buyer requests Color Forwarding for this service.

$eref.description: Details of an UNI product specification. These details are used for Serviceability Responses.
$eref.title: uniProductSpecDetail

___objectType.description: The type of the object, uniProductSpecDetail.

___portSpeed.description: The speed of the port (in bits/s).

___id.description: Unique identifier for the UNI Product Specification Detail.

$eref.description: Details of an Broadband product specification. These details are used for Serviceability Responses.
$eref.title: broadbandProductSpecDetail

___accessMedium.description: The type of medium the product should be delivered over (e.g., FIBER, COAX, TWISTED_PAIR).

___type.description: The specific type of product being detailed.

___publicIpV6Addresses.description: The number of dynamically assigned public IPv6 addresses available as part of the product.

___bridgeMode.description: An indicator that specifies whether routers are configured in bridge mode as part of the product offer.

___cpeModel.description: The model of Customer Premise Equipment (CPE) provided as part of the product (e.g. Surfboard SB6141).

___uploadSpeed.description: The upload speed for the Product Spec (e.g. 10Mbps, 100Mbps, 1Gbps, 10Gbps).

___accessTechnology.description: The underlying technology used to transmit data across the Access Medium (e.g., DOCSIS_3.0).

___serviceLevelAgreement.description: The standard level of service provided as part of the product.

___publicIpV4Addresses.description: The number of dynamically assigned public IPv4 addresses available as part of the product.

___dhcpSupport.description: An indicator that specifies whether DHCP services are provided as a standard part of the product offer.

___downloadSpeed.description: The download speed for the Product Spec (e.g. 10Mbps, 100Mbps, 1Gbps, 10Gbps).

___cpeMake.description: The brand of Customer Premise Equipment (CPE) provided as part of the product (e.g., Arris).

___objectType.description: The type of the object, broadbandProductSpecDetail.

___id.description: Unique identifier for the Broadband Product Specification Detail.

___staticIpAddresses.description: The maximum number of Static IP addresses available as part of the product.

$eref.description: Details of an Static IP Tier product specification. These details are used for Serviceability Responses.
$eref.title: staticIpTierProductSpecDetail

___type.description: The specific type of product being detailed.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, staticIpTierProductSpecDetail.

___id.description: Unique identifier for the Static IP Tier Product Specification Detail.

___productCode.description: Code that an organization uses for a product in its internal systems that can refer to one or a set of products (e.g., EVCINTER).

___productName.description: The name a product is known by within an organization (e.g., 5Mb Business Ethernet).

___objectType.description: The type of the object, quote.

___pricing.description: An array of Pricing Response for the quote.

___id.description: Unique identifier for the Product Specification.

___productFeatures.description: An array of Features of the Prouct Spec.

$eref.description: Details of a Product Specification response. These details are used for Serviceability Responses.
$eref.title: productSpecResponse

___productCode.description: Code that an organization uses for a product in its internal systems that can refer to one or a set of products (e.g., EVCINTER).

___productName.description: The name a product is known by within an organization (e.g., 5Mb Business Ethernet).

___productFeatures.description: An array of Features of the Prouct Spec.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, productSpecResponse.

___productType.description: The specific type of product being detailed (e.g. ACCESS_EPL).

___id.description: Unique identifier for the Product Specification.

___productCategory.description: A high-level categorization of products such as Ethernet.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, productSpecResponse.

___description.description: A description of the construction costs associated with the product.

___quote.description: The quote of the Construction Cost.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, constructionCost.

___productType.description: The specific type of product being detailed (e.g. ACCESS_EPL).

___id.description: Unique identifier for the Product Specification.

___productCategory.description: A high-level categorization of products such as Ethernet.
